-- task_tool.cue --
package home

import (
    "tool/cli"
    "tool/flag"
)

command: run: task: {
    flags: flag.Set & {
        // whom to say hi to
        who: string | *"World"
    }
    print: cli.Print & {
        cmd: "echo \(task.flags)"
    }
}
